Class Deck

java.lang.Object
model.card.Deck
public class Deck extends Object
The Deck class is responsible for managing the card pool in the Jackaroo game. It handles loading cards from a CSV file, shuffling the deck, and drawing cards for players.

The deck supports both Standard cards and Wild cards, dynamically loading them based on the CSV input. The drawCards() method is used to draw a hand of 4 cards for players.

  • Method Details

    • loadCardPool

      public static void loadCardPool(BoardManager boardManager, GameManager gameManager) throws IOException, IllegalArgumentException
      Loads the card pool by reading from the CSV file.

      The method distinguishes between standard and wild cards based on the row length of the CSV input. It uses helper methods createStandardCard(BoardManager, GameManager, String[], String) and createWildCard(BoardManager, GameManager, String[], String) to handle specific card types.

      Parameters:
      boardManager - The BoardManager interface to manage board interactions.
      gameManager - The GameManager interface to manage game state.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an issue reading the CSV file.
      IllegalArgumentException - If the CSV format is invalid.

    • drawCards

      public static ArrayList<Card> drawCards()
      Draws a hand of 4 cards from the shuffled card pool.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Card objects representing the drawn hand.
